title: Adele Broke Her Grammy In Half To Share With Beyonce
text:
Home > Music > Adele Broke Her Grammy In Half To Share With Beyonce Adele Broke Her Grammy In Half To Share With Beyonce 0 0   13, 2017 at 02:38am Adele has all the love for Beyonce. 
Adele may have won Album Of The Year over Beyonce , but even she knows she didn't all the way deserve it. During the British singer's acceptance speech, she ended off pouring out her heart on Beyonce's importance as an artist. Check out the video of her speech below. 
What the cameras apparently didn't catch, however, was that Adele actually broke the Grammy in half, and gave part of it to Beyonce. That has to be one of the most legendary moments in Grammy history. Adele Broke her Grammy and gave the other half to Beyonce!
